name: part_013
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Omaru Poruka Birthday Concert2024!! POL ROCK FES!!!!! [W25VvoWh5zY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka introduces the final song of the concert.
Omaru Polka performs 'Sugar Song and Bitter Step'.

subtitles.original: さあ、最後はこの曲でお別れしましょう！
subtitles.english: Now, let's part with this final song!

subtitles.original: シュガーソングとビターステップ！
subtitles.english: Sugar Song and Bitter Step!

subtitles.original:
シュガーソングとビターステップ
作詞・作曲 田淵智也
subtitles.english:
Sugar Song and Bitter Step
Lyrics & Composition: Tomoya Tabuchi

subtitles.original: イェー！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 超天変地異みたいな狂騒にも慣れて
subtitles.english: Getting used to the uproar like a super natural disaster

subtitles.original: こんな日常を平和と見間違う
subtitles.english: Mistaking such a daily life for peace

subtitles.original: ランブリングコースター 揺さぶられながら
subtitles.english: Rumbling coaster, while being shaken

subtitles.original: 見失えないものはなんだ？
subtitles.english: What is it that I can't lose sight of?

subtitles.original: 平等性原理主義の概念に飲まれて
subtitles.english: Swallowed by the concept of equality fundamentalism

subtitles.original: 心までがまるでエトセトラ
subtitles.english: Even my heart is like et cetera

subtitles.original: 大嫌い 大好き ちゃんと喋らなきゃ
subtitles.english: Hate it, love it, I have to speak properly

subtitles.original: 人形とさして変わらないし
subtitles.english: Otherwise I'm no different from a doll

subtitles.original: 宵街を行く人だかりに
subtitles.english: In the crowd of people going through the evening streets

subtitles.original: 嬉しそうだったり 寂しそうだったり
subtitles.english: Looking happy, or looking lonely

subtitles.original: コントラストが五線を飛び回り
subtitles.english: The contrast flies around the staff

subtitles.original: 歌とリズムになれば
subtitles.english: If it becomes song and rhythm

subtitles.original: ママレード＆シュガーソング、ピーナッツ＆ビターステップ
subtitles.english: Marmalade & Sugar Song, Peanuts & Bitter Step

subtitles.original: 甘くて苦くて目が回りそうです
subtitles.english: Sweet and bitter, I feel like my head is spinning

subtitles.original: 南南西を目指してパーティを続けよう
subtitles.english: Let's keep the party going towards the south-southwest

subtitles.original: 世界中を驚かせてしまう夜になる
subtitles.english: It will be a night that surprises the whole world

subtitles.original: I feel 上々 連鎖になってリフレクト
subtitles.english: I feel great, becoming a chain and reflecting

subtitles.original: フー！
subtitles.english: Woo!

subtitles.original: フー！
subtitles.english: Woo!

subtitles.original: ニッパー！
subtitles.english: Ni-pa!

subtitles.original: ハーイ！
subtitles.english: Hi!

subtitles.original: 蓋然性合理主義の正論に揉まれて
subtitles.english: Buffeted by the sound arguments of probabilistic rationalism

subtitles.original: 僕らの音楽は道具になり下がる？
subtitles.english: Will our music degenerate into a mere tool?

subtitles.original: こっちを向いてよ 背を向けないでよ
subtitles.english: Look this way, don't turn your back

subtitles.original: それは正論にならないけど
subtitles.english: That won't become a sound argument, though

subtitles.original: 祭囃子のその後で
subtitles.english: After the festival music

subtitles.original: 昂ぶったままの人 泣き出し出してしまう人
subtitles.english: Those who stay excited, those who start crying

subtitles.original: 多分同じだろ
subtitles.english: They're probably the same

subtitles.original: でも言葉にしようもんなら
subtitles.english: But if I were to put it into words

subtitles.original: 稚拙がきわまれり
subtitles.english: It would be the height of childishness

subtitles.original: 最高だシュガーソング、幸せでビターステップ
subtitles.english: It's the best, Sugar Song; feeling happy, Bitter Step

subtitles.original: 死ねない理由をそこに映し出せ
subtitles.english: Project the reason why I can't die onto that

subtitles.original: 惜しがったって等速で明日は来ちゃうけど
subtitles.english: Even if you regret it, tomorrow will come at the same speed

subtitles.original: 脳内天気予報のアップデートを果たしたなら
subtitles.english: Once the internal weather forecast has been updated

subtitles.original: フー！
subtitles.english: Woo!

subtitles.original: イェー！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: フー！
subtitles.english: Woo!

subtitles.original: ヘーイ！
subtitles.english: Hey!

subtitles.original: フー！
subtitles.english: Woo!

subtitles.original: フー！
subtitles.english: Woo!

subtitles.original: フー！
subtitles.english: Woo!

subtitles.original: 盛り上がってこう！
subtitles.english: Let's get excited!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: いっそげー！
subtitles.english: Hurry up!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: 踊れー！
subtitles.english: Dance!

subtitles.original: Someday 狂騒が息を潜めても
subtitles.english: Someday, even if the uproar holds its breath

subtitles.original: Someday 正論に意味がなくなっても
subtitles.english: Someday, even if sound arguments lose their meaning

subtitles.original: Feeling song & step
subtitles.english: Feeling song & step

subtitles.original: 鳴らし続けることだけが
subtitles.english: Just continuing to make sound

subtitles.original: 僕たちを僕たちたらしめる証明になる
subtitles.english: Will be the proof that makes us who we are

subtitles.original: Q.E.D.!
subtitles.english: Q.E.D.!

subtitles.original: ママレード＆シュガーソング、ピーナッツ＆ビターステップ
subtitles.english: Marmalade & Sugar Song, Peanuts & Bitter Step

subtitles.original: 生きていく理由をそこに映し出せ
subtitles.english: Project the reason for living onto that

subtitles.original: 北北東は後背位 その距離が誇らしい
subtitles.english: North-north-east is the rear position, that distance is something to be proud of

subtitles.original: 世界中を驚かせ続けよう
subtitles.english: Let's keep surprising the whole world

subtitles.original: ママレード＆シュガーソング、ピーナッツ＆ビターステップ
subtitles.english: Marmalade & Sugar Song, Peanuts & Bitter Step

subtitles.original: 甘くて苦くて目が回りそうです
subtitles.english: Sweet and bitter, I feel like my head is spinning

subtitles.original: 南南西を目指してパーティを続けよう
subtitles.english: Let's keep the party going towards the south-southwest

subtitles.original: 世界中を驚かせてしまう夜になる
subtitles.english: It will be a night that surprises the whole world

subtitles.original: I feel 上々 連鎖になってリフレクト
subtitles.english: I feel great, becoming a chain and reflecting

subtitles.original: Goes on 一石を投じては絶好
subtitles.english: Goes on, throwing a stone and it's perfect

subtitles.original: ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi!

subtitles.original: ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi!

subtitles.original: 一石を投じては絶好
subtitles.english: Throwing a stone and it's perfect

subtitles.original: You got happiness!
subtitles.english: You got happiness!

subtitles.original: Wait with melody!
subtitles.english: Wait with melody!
